title: Fueled by Billionaires, Political Spending Shatters Records Again
description: In the money race between America’s billionaires and small donors, the emerging political oligarchy is showing staying power. Both parties have megadonors, but Republicans have far more.
dc:creator: Jonathan Weisman and Rachel Shorey
media:credit: Erika P. Rodriguez for The New York Times
media:description: Samuel Bankman-Fried is the Democrat who made arguably the biggest splash for his party. His $37 million in giving helped fund the Democrats’ two main super PACs.
